availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: M. C. Doris (Webster Co. Circuit Co. Clerk)

body.p: Webster County, Kentucky, merchant and court clerk. Tennessee native. Married Sarah E. Doris. Father of Virginia C. Doris, Margaret A. Doris, Mary F. Doris, Emily A. Doris, Henry A. Doris, and George A. Doris. Merchant in Webster County in 1860. Clerk of the Webster County Court and the Webster Circuit Court in Dixon, Kentucky.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, Unnamed District, p. 129. KYR-0001-004-0137.
